AddonDescription.message: A cookie and browser storage data manager on steroids to mark, 'flag', and manage cookies using rulesets.

ProfileButtonHelpText.message: Profile mode - Selected 'key icon' cookies wont be deleted by global, auto-flag or by regular flagging modes on page load/reload/navigation. If no cookies are keyed, profile mode will allow all domain cookies. This is the 'logged in account' state. You can also manage the profile cookies list in 'preferences'.
